name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms Hadou
name_original: Romance of the Three Kingdoms Hadou
description:
A plentiful variety of unique officers
Cao Cao, Liu Bei, Sun Quan, Lu Bu... Numerous officers from the Romance of the Three Kingdoms appear!
KOEI TECMO has done extensive research in order to depict the strengths and character of the Romance of the Three Kingdoms officers through their appearance, stats, and skills.
Also, for the first time in the series, the Romance of the Three Kingdoms officers will have unique voice-overs, and appear in exquisitely animated cut scenes!

Clash in real-time battles
Romance of the Three Kingdoms Hadou is an MMO with real-time battles, so players can experience the chaotic world of the Romance of the Three Kingdoms.
Players can give orders to their deployed units in real-time, and change their objectives as they wish depending on the battle situation.
When battling against other armies, teaming up with your friends is the key to victory!

Manage domestic affairs and develop cities
Players take on the role of Ruler. Performing domestic affairs and developing cities will be the first step on your road to conquest.
As you upgrade your facilities, functions such as "Develop Siege-Weapons" and "Research Techniques" will become available.
In Romance of the Three Kingdoms Hadou, you can strengthen your force by forming your very own strategies!

Castle sieges with other players' armies
Become affiliated with armies, and join up with other players to conquer cities!
Castle Sieges are epic army vs. army battles where countless units clash together.
By forming your own strategies, conquer and defend numerous key locations, rule over cities, and aim to unify China!
